&FlowMultiTagRowRequest; declare @p char(6), @r nvarchar(4000), @q nvarchar(4000)
select top 0 tr.id, b.nhieu_dvt, a.he_so, rtrim(b.ma_vi_tri) as ma_vi_tri, 0 as vi_tri_yn, rtrim(c.ma_lo) as ma_lo, b.lo_yn, b.sua_tk_vt, b.gia_ton, a.gia_nt, rtrim(a.ma_vt) as ma_vt, rtrim(a.ma_kho) as ma_kho, a.so_luong as ton13, rtrim(a.dvt) as dvt, a.ngay_ct, rtrim(b.tk_vt) as tk_vt &FlowMultiUserDefinedFieldsQuery;&BI.PDTran.Retrieve.Declare.Fields.SA; into #d from #tagRow tr cross join bid06$000000 a cross join dmvt b cross join dmlo c cross join bim06$000000 m set @r = ' insert into #d select tr.id, b.nhieu_dvt, a.he_so, rtrim(b.ma_vi_tri), case when exists(select top 1 ma_kho from dmvitri z where z.ma_kho = a.ma_kho) then 1 else 0 end, '''', isnull(b.lo_yn, 0), b.sua_tk_vt, b.gia_ton, a.gia_nt, rtrim(a.ma_vt), rtrim(a.ma_kho), 0, rtrim(a.dvt), a.ngay_ct, rtrim(b.tk_vt) &FlowMultiUserDefinedFieldsQuery;&BI.PDTran.Retrieve.Select.Fields.SA; from (select id, stt_rec, stt_rec0 from #tagRow where p = ''%Partition'') tr join bid06$%Partition a on tr.stt_rec = a.stt_rec and tr.stt_rec0 = a.stt_rec0 join bim06$%Partition m on tr.stt_rec = m.stt_rec left join dmvt b on a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt '
select distinct p into #p from #tagRow select @p = min(p) from #p while @p is not null begin set @q = replace(@r, '%Partition', @p) exec sp_executesql @q select @p = min(p) from #p where p > @p end
&FlowMultiUpdateCurrentStock;
update #d set tk_vt = isnull(b.tk_vt, '') from #d a left join dmvt b on a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt select '' as array$, id, &OtherCopyField; from #d &FlowMultiOrderBy; return
